mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TNA ( TNA_NO , USER_NO , TNA_DATE , CLOCK_IN , CLOCK_OUT , TNA_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_TNANO.NEXTVAL , #{userNo} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI') , NULL , NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE TNA SET CLOCK_OUT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI') , TNA_STATUS = CASE WHEN CLOCK_OUT >= '17:00' THEN '정상근무' WHEN CLOCK_OUT >= '18:00' THEN '연장근무' WHEN CLOCK_OUT < '17:00' THEN '조기퇴근' WHEN CLOCK_OUT IS NULL THEN '퇴근미체크' END WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND TNA_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO , LEAVE_TOTAL , LEAVE_USE , LEAVE_REST FROM ANNUAL_LEAVE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT APPLY_DATE , LEAVE_TYPE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(START_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(L.END_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE" , LEAVE_USE , REASON , L.STATUS , USER_NAME , DEPT_NAME FROM LEAVE_ALIST L JOIN EMPLOYEE E USING(USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY APPLY_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANNUAL_LEAVE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') "TNA_DATE" , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DY') "TNA_DAY" , USER_NO , USER_NAME , CLOCK_IN , CLOCK_OUT , TRUNC(ABS((TO_DATE(CLOCK_OUT, 'HH24:MI')-(TO_DATE(CLOCK_IN, 'HH24:MI'))))*24-1) "WORK_TIME" , TRUNC(ABS((TO_DATE(CLOCK_OUT, 'HH24:MI')-(TO_DATE('17:00', 'HH24:MI'))))*24) "OVER_TIME" , TNA_STATUS FROM TNA JOIN EMPLOYEE E USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND TO_DATE(TNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{startDate} AND TO_DATE(TNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{endDate} ORDER BY TNA_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TNA WHERE TO_DATE(TNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
